units.description: Whenver the user asks for units sold
units.calculation_guidelines: Use the column 'units' to perform the calculation

sales.description: Any metrics related to sales, including 'sales', 'revenue', 'net sales', 'top sales'.
sales.calculation_guidelines: Use the column gross_sales to perform the calculation

no_orders.calculation_guidelines: Use COUNT(distinct order_id) in order to get the proper number of order.

no_customers.calculation_guidelines: Use COUNT(distinct buyer_email) in order to get the proper number of customers.

basket_size.description: The average number of items per order.
basket_size.calculation_guidelines: - Use COUNT(asin) / COUNT(DISTINCT order_id) to calculate the average number of items per order

basket_value.description: Refers to the total amount of money a customer is expected to spend on a single shopping sessio
basket_value.calculation_guidelines: - Use SUM(gross_sales) / COUNT(DISTINCT order_id) to calculate the basket value
